verses.text: \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* thirteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* twelfth \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* above \w is|strong="H0834"\w* called \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* designed \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* massacred, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* greedy \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* blood, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w case|strong="H1697"\w* being altered, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* began \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* upper hand, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* revenge \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* adversaries.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* \w themselves|strong="H7451"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* persecutors. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* durst \w withstand|strong="H5975"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w gone|strong="H5307"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* judges \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* lieutenants, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* dignity, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* presided \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, extolled \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Mardochai:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* knew \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* prince \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* power: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fame|strong="H8089"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* name increased daily, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* \w spread|strong="H1980"\w* abroad \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w men’s|strong="H0376"\w* mouths.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* great \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, repaying according \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w what|strong="H7522"\w* \w they|strong="H7522"\w* \w had|strong="H3064"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*:

Insomuch \w that|strong="H0376"\w* even \w in|strong="H0376"\w* Susan \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, besides \w the|strong="H2026"\w* ten sons \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Aman \w the|strong="H2026"\w* Agagite, \w the|strong="H2026"\w* enemy \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*: \w whose|strong="H0376"\w* names \w are|strong="H0376"\w* these:
Pharsandatha, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* Delphon, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* Esphatha,
\w And|strong="H0853"\w* Phoratha, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w Adalia|strong="H0118"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w Aridatha|strong="H0743"\w*,
\w And|strong="H0853"\w* Phermesta, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w Arisai|strong="H0747"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w Aridai|strong="H0742"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* Jezatha.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* touch \w the|strong="H0853"\w* spoils \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* goods.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* presently \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Susan \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* city \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Susan, \w besides|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aman: \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w think|strong="H0559"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* askest thou \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w command|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* please \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Susan \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aman \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* gibbets.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w should|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* forthwith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w edict|strong="H1881"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w hung|strong="H8518"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Susan, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aman \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fourteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6950"\w* \w together|strong="H1571"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* Susan \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* substance.

Moreover \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H0505"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* subject \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* dominion \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* persecutors: insomuch \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w number|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* Billed amounted \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventy-five|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w any|strong="H2026"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* goods.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* thirteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* slaughter, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fourteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w left|strong="H5117"\w* \w off|strong="H0853"\w*. \w Which|strong="H4960"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* ordained \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* holy \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w times|strong="H3117"\w* hereafter \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* celebrate \w it|strong="H5117"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w*, \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w banquets|strong="H4960"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* killing \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* city \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Susan, \w were|strong="H0834"\w* employed \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* slaughter \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* thirteenth \w and|strong="H3117"\w* fourteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* month: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fifteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w rested|strong="H5117"\w*. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* appointed \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* holy \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* not walled \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w villages|strong="H6519"\w*, appointed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fourteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w banquets|strong="H4960"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8057"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* send \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w banquets|strong="H4960"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* meats.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Mardochai \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* comprised \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* abode \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H0428"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w those|strong="H0428"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*,

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fourteenth \w and|strong="H6965"\w* fifteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* holy \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w always|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* return \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* celebrate \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* solemn honour:

\w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* revenged \w themselves|strong="H2896"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w mirth|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* send \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* meats; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H5117"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*.
